backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profile management and ticket submission with access control for user and admin actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature changes, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, assets, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx with a single root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling header, hero, services, contact form, tracking section, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Contact form component using react-hook-form and backend mutation to submit quote requests with validation and success states.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, headline, features, and CTA buttons scrolling to contact and tracking sections.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Displays three service tiers with pricing, features, and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the footer with brand info, quick navigation links, and social media icons with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a sticky header with responsive navigation, scroll-based styling, and smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/TrackPackageSect: Implements order tracking UI allowing users to submit a tracking code and view progress, errors, and status steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation for submitting contact forms through the backend actor and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingQueries.ts: Defines a mutation for fetching tracking data from the backend with error handling for missing codes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers plus extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and utilities including typography and a square logo container.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Provides a helper to build asset URLs that respect the appâ€™s base path by cleaning slashes and using import.meta.env.BASE_URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors tied to CSS variables, fonts, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests related to renaming and repositioning Track Order content.
